channel.title: Deep into Void
channel.description: Recent content on Deep into Void

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, welcome to my site. I’m Peng Sun, please call me void-main1 or Harry. I’m a full stack engineer and I’ve built many apps and services. Currently I’m interested in AI-related infrastructure. Education Bachelor Degree, Software Engineering, Harbin Institute of Technology. 2008 ~ 2012 Dropout from Institute of Software, Chinese Academy of Sciences. 2012 ~ 2013 Job Experience Co-founder @NexusHubs. 2013.10 ~ 2014.12 Software Engineer @BeeQuick. 2015.
